name: Eros - A Sketchruary 20 Entry
description:
This is my entry for the 12 Days of Sketchruary Game Jam.

You are Eros on the big Day of Love when your bow suddenly breaks! You must convince people of love without your magical arrows.

Help the people of Ancient Greece fall and stay in love by completing various quests for them.

There are a few quests to complete around the 3 towns. Currently the bread making quest is unfinished and doesn't work that well (uncompletable). Zoe's quest is a little iffy too. You have to talk to her multiple times after completing the quest to get the correct dialogue but otherwise it works fine.

I quite enjoyed making this little game though there are definite quest structure improvements to make if I were to turn this into a full game. Most assets are CC0 or similar no-credit licensed assets from sites like OpenGameArt.org, Pexels.com and Pixabay.com.

The only version that's been tested is the Windows version.
